title: Why Do Black Men Hurt Their Women?: Discovering Why Black Men Cause So Much Hurt On Women They Love
description: ".....Black Men must Understand, that Hurting their Women, they are hurting the Only Ally that Stands with them in their darkest times....." WHY DO BLACK MEN HURT THEIR WOMEN? explore real relationships and marriage between black men and their women that once was filled with bliss, but ended due to complications that was too painful to overcome. Many men feel that the sole reason their relationships or marriages end is because of disrespect and cheating. Black men hurt their women for numerous reasons, and this book reflect the consciousness of men that are sorrowful and wish circumstances were different so the outcome of their relationships would not have ended. This book has been revised with new chapters for more reading pleasure!
author: Raymond Sturgis
